text: Bellmore may refer to: *The Bellmores, New York (Bellmore and North Bellmore), census-designated place (CDP) in Nassau County, New York, United States *Bellmore, Indiana, unincorporated community in Union Township, Parke County, Indiana, United States *Bellmore (LIRR station), a train station in Bellmore, New York *6445 Bellmore, an asteroid ==See also== * Belmore (disambiguation) * Bellemore, surname
title: Bellmore
